pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
I think there are good arguments for either skipping or not skipping.

We could consider applying it to all components for now to ensure completeness (because I don't think the codecheck really depends on the ability configure or build), but then if that turns out to be a problem for some reason, we could patch it later to skip any unconfigurable components.
